Skill.Desc:
Summon a Chirpuff that self-inflates and blasts a powerful gust of wind forward {0} times. Each blast inflicts {1} Aero DMG and pushes enemies backwards.

CD: {2}s
Skill.SimpleDesc: Summon a Chirpuff to blast a powerful gust of wind. Deals Aero DMG and knocks enemies back.

3.Desc:
Casting Echo Skill grants {0} Heavy Attack DMG Bonus to the caster for {1}s.
Additionally, all Resonators in the team gain {2} Echo Skill DMG Bonus for {4}s, stacking up to {3} times. Echoes of the same name can only trigger this effect once. The record of Echo triggering this effect is cleared along with this effect. At {3} stacks, casting Echo Skill again resets the duration of this effect.
